description:
A member of the Church whose alter ego is Neizai One, a mysterious masked woman working under Ulyte`s wing with an unknown agenda. She briefly joined Lashara`s platoon after the Head Church`s headquarters was destroyed by Doll, but she later shows her true colors at the Barrier Workshop while holding a mysterious object in her hands. Her Seikijin is grey with a cape and a mask with active camouflage armed with a large sniper rifle. She shares the same civilian name as Kenshi`s mother, also named Rea.
Source: Wiki
name: Leia Second
